title: Eureka RapidClean Pro Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Vacuum Cleaner for Home Rechargeable, Lightweight Stick Vacuum for Hardwood and Pet Hair, Blue, NEC280TL
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.
The Eureka RapidClean Pro NEC280TL is a powerful and convenient battery-operated cordless vacuum cleaner that can keep your home clean and fresh.

This lightweight stick cordless vacuum cleaner weighs only 5.3 lbs, making it easy to maneuver and carry around. With its cordless battery-operated vacuum cleaner technology, you won't be tethered to a wall socket.

This rechargeable cordless stick vacuum’s battery delivers up to 40 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time on a single charge, providing plenty of time to tackle even biggest cleaning jobs, while the Easy Rest feature and included wall mount allows convenient storage and charging.

This wireless vacuum cleaner is also incredibly versatile with LED headlight and multiple accessories, which allows cleaning every nook and cranny, from car interiors to tight spaces between furniture. Maintenance is a breeze with the washable filter, which can be easily removed and cleaned.

Don't settle for a bulky and cumbersome vacuum. Upgrade to the Eureka NEC280TL cordless vacuum cleaner perfect for your home, and enjoy the convenience and power of a stick cordless vacuum that truly delivers.
